forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 81. South southeast wind around 8 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%. New rainfall amounts between a quarter and half of an inch possible.

forecast.shortForecast: Showers And Thunderstorms Likely then Slight Chance Showers And Thunderstorms
forecast.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms likely before 8pm, then a slight chance of showers and thunderstorms between 8pm and 2am. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 65. North northeast wind around 6 mph. Chance of precipitation is 70%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
